mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TOUR ( CONTENT_ID, TOUR_EXP, USETIME_TOUR, PARKING ) VALUES ( #{contentId}, #{tourExp}, #{usetimeTour}, #{parking} )
mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_ID AS contentId, TOUR_EXP AS tourExp, USETIME_TOUR AS usetimeTour, PARKING AS parking FROM TB_TOUR WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
